scraping_notes.difficulty_explanation: Medium difficulty. Has iCal export option which makes structured data extraction easier, but requires selecting from multiple department calendars. HTML scraping is functional but JavaScript rendering required. No API available.
scraping_notes.data_quality: Good - events have consistent structure with title, date, time, location, description
scraping_notes.data_completeness: Moderate - missing some fields like registration info, cost, contact details, individual event URLs
scraping_notes.kid_relevance_notes: Mix of content - library events have high kid-relevance (70-80%), but overall county calendar is diluted by government meetings, health services, and adult programs. Overall kid-relevance: 44%
